text:
L.A. Story is a 1991 American satirical romantic fantasy comedy-drama film written by and starring Steve Martin, and directed by Mick Jackson. Set in Los Angeles, California, it relates a series of episodes in the romantic life of an L.A. TV weather forecaster. The movie includes surreal sequences in which he is offered romantic advice flashed to him by a freeway sign. It blends romantic comedy with fantasy and satire elements that both satirize and celebrate So Cal culture.
The soundtrack includes three songs by Enya, "On Your Shore" and "Exile" (from Watermark) and "Epona" (from Enya).
